Function Documentation

struct Motor_Struct* Motor_Init ( struct Motor_Struct *  MS,
int  pwmChannel,
int  controlA,
int  controlB,
char  Mode 
) [read]

Init a Motor Struct.

Set up necessary paramters like PWM Channel, Control Bits and anchor the appropriate function pointer of Set PWM according to Mode selected

See also:
Motor_Struct
Parameters:
MS The Motor Struct Pointer
pwmChannel PWM Channel
controlA Control Bit A
controlB Control Bit B
Mode SELF or MODE2103
Returns:
Pointer to the inited Motor_Struct
